title: Observation collection
description: Collection of observations which may have a common (a) feature of interest (b) observed property (c) observation procedure.

id.title: id
id.description: A unique identifier for the observation collection

procedure.title: featureOfInterest
procedure.description: the observation procedure used in all observations in the collection

featureOfInterest.title: featureOfInterest
featureOfInterest.description: the single feature which all observations in the collection are concerned with

samplingStrategy.title: samplingStrategy
samplingStrategy.description: a strategy, such as a sampling feature, which mediates between the procedure and the ultimate feature of interest

observedProperty.title: observedProperty
observedProperty.description: the property measured or estimated by all observations in the collection

phenomenonTime.title: phenomenonTime
phenomenonTime.description: Time at which the estimate of the property that is the result of the observation is associated with the feature of interest

resultTime.title: resultTime
resultTime.description: time at which the result became available, after all processing steps were completed

uom.title: unit-of-measure
uom.description: unit of measure for all quantitative result values

vocabulary.title: vocabulary
vocabulary.description: vocabulary for all categorical result values
